root.name: Sssnake
root.description: OverviewSssnake is an action game developed and published by Data Age for the Atari 2600 platform.GameplaySssnake is a game that plays similarly to Centipede in that the player controlled character shoots at invading snakes. Rather than just shooting up from the bottom of the screen, the player is contained in the center and must shoot the snakes from all directions.
